description: DVD authoring and slideshow creation application
details:
Mistelix is a DVD authoring application with also Theora slideshow
 creation capabilities. It allows you to create slideshows with
 transition effects from a set of images, and even include videos
 in your presentations.

 This package includes the main application with OGG compatibility. An
 additional plugin will be necessary in order to export your creations
 to a format suitable for DVDs.
